sentences.en: All actions by firms in a monopolistically competitive industry are assumed to be simultaneous.
sentences.cn: 垄断竞争工业部门中各厂商的行动假设都是同时发生的.

sentences.en: Most applications involve simultaneous stabilization on three orthogonal axes.
sentences.cn: 大多数应用要求在三个相互垂直的轴上同时进得稳定.

sentences.en: Such steps mean the simultaneous solution of either two linear equations.
sentences.cn: 这样的步骤意味着同时求解两个线性方程.

sentences.en: The analysis of statically indeterminate structures generally requires the solution of linear simultaneous.
sentences.cn: 静不定结构分析一般需要求解线性联立方程式.

sentences.en: The audience burst into simultaneous applause.
The conference hall is provided with facilities for simultaneous interpretation in five languages.
sentences.cn: 这个会议大厅配有五种语言的同声传译设备.

sentences.en: The simultaneous attack of erosion and corrosion quickens the destroy of alloy.
sentences.cn: 腐蚀/冲蚀联合作用加快了合金的破坏.

sentences.en: The simultaneous fade - up of one image and fade - down of a second image.
sentences.cn: 一 幅图象 逐渐增强的同时另一幅图象逐渐暗淡.

sentences.en: The simultaneous interpreter under siege simulated composure and shrugged off the trouble.
sentences.cn: 那个被包围的同声传译者假装镇定并对被围这件事不屑一顾.

sentences.en: The speeches will be broadcast live, with simultaneous translation (= immediate translation, as the person is speaking ) into English.
sentences.cn: 这些演讲将作现场直播，并配有英语同声传译。

sentences.en: The theatre will provide simultaneous translation in both English and Chinese.
sentences.cn: 剧院将提供英语和汉语的同声翻译。

sentences.en: The two simultaneous shots sounded like one.
sentences.cn: 那同时发出的两声枪响听起来像是一响.

sentences.en: There were several simultaneous attacks by the rebels.
sentences.cn: 反叛者同时发动了几起攻击。

sentences.en: They grabbed each other’s hands in simultaneous panic.
sentences.cn: 他们俩同时惊慌起来，相互抓住对方的手。

sentences.en: They may be exacerbated by a simultaneous deficiency of calcium.
sentences.cn: 由于同时缺乏钙而使之恶化.

sentences.en: This event was almost simultaneous with that one.
sentences.cn: 这件事几乎是与那件事同时发生的.

sentences.en: Up to twenty users can have simultaneous access to the system.
sentences.cn: 最多可有20名用户同时登该系统。

sentences.en: With simultaneous salmon ella or swine evysipelas infection, the spleen may be enlarged and dark.
sentences.cn: 由于同时感染沙门氏菌病或猪丹毒, 脾脏可能增大和发黑.

words.tran_cn: 同时；[计][力] 同时性；同时发生

phrases.tran_cn: 同时处理；同时模拟输入设备

trans.tran_cn: 同时发生的，同时存在的，同时的，联立的
trans.tran_en: things that are simultaneous happen at exactly the same time
